channel.title: Deltascape spec's
channel.description:
Ok, how can i remove the spec's from weapons? becuz i have added ::pickup and ::pure for everyone to make the server better,.. but sum times people lagg out becuz of the spec's so cud i remove them? i have looked in client.java searched for the weapon's and i cudent find the spec to remove it,...
does any1 no how to remove spec's? [deltascape source]

item.title: Deltascape spec's
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

ty chassy that worked ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape spec's
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You asked this question yesterday and we answered it…but since I have a DeltaScape server on my Desktop right now for some extra code…I guess I can help, but I do NOT work with DS so…

Ok…I found it, and if you couldn’t find this, that scares me.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(3547); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(30); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }

Delete it, and do the same to the others…

Read full topic
